name: Mask of the Tiger's Bite
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  "Sumirezome Sangetsu Kogetsukan" depicts the fierce oni Torachiyo shatteringthe Shogun's naginata with a single bite, thus gaining the upper hand for atime. As such, masks that are based on him have finely crafted fangs.  In the denouement of this tale, the wounded oni fled into the forest, deathlyafraid of showing himself even to the cold moonlight. The wind that whispersthrough the alleys and valleys can be said to resemble his quiet cries ofagony, and so there is a poetic seasonal expression for this in Inazuma:"Torachiyo's Wind."
